bugfixes: Added override setting to middleware configuration
features: Added ability to disable capturing of content in LLM events `ai_monitoring.record_content.enabled`
Added ability to disable instrumenting streaming via `ai_monitoring.streaming.enabled` = `false`
Added Bedrock LLM streamed response handling
Added llm attribute to all transactions that contain llm spans for bedrock
Added handling errors by adding additional attributes to the transaction errors.
Added ability to store feedback ids by request id
Added LLama2 support to LLM events and mock server
Added initial objects for LLM events
